# bindery

> **Automated Nanobind Generator**

`bindery` is a modern, automated C++ binding generator for Python, targeting the [nanobind](https://github.com/wjakob/nanobind) library. It streamlines the creation of Python bindings by scanning existing C++ codebases and generating high-performance binding code.

## ðŸš€ Status: Reserved / Pre-Alpha

**This project is currently under active development.** The name `bindery` is reserved on PyPI for this tool.

## Installation

```bash
pip install bindery
```

*(Note: Package is currently a placeholder)*
